egress.description: Apply rule to outgoing network traffic

exclude.description: Exclude remote IP prefix from traffic count

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: json, shell, table, value, yaml)

include.description: Include remote IP prefix from traffic count (default)

ingress.description: Apply rule to incoming network traffic (default)

meter.description: Label to associate with this metering rule (name or ID)

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

project_domain.description: Domain the project belongs to (name or ID). This can be used in case collisions between project names exist.

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

remote_ip_prefix.description: The remote IP prefix to associate with this rule
